import TextBar from "../../components/TextBar"; import MainMenu from "../../components/MainMenu" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import "./AddUser.css" import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function AddUser(){ const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; return( <>
Name Email address Password Confirm Password Profile Picture
Have an Account ? Login
)} export default AddUser;
